tool_description: Large Language Models Pricing Calculator by API Robots
name: Large Language Models Pricing API
title: Large Language Models Pricing API

api_list.name: getModelsPricing
api_list.description: Get LLM models pricing. Calculate the cost of generating text with LLM models. Use the parameters for calculating sessions and tokens per session.

optional_parameters.name: sessions
optional_parameters.description: Number of sessions. The default value is 10000.

optional_parameters.name: tokens_per_session
optional_parameters.description: Consumed tokens per session. For example 100 words x 5 characters each = 500 characters = 125 tokens (in english language). 25% of the tokens are used for input and 75% for output. The default value is 150.
